article:
The '1976–77 Football League Cup' was the seventeenth season of the
Football League Cup, a knockout competition for England's top 92 football clubs.
The competition started on the 14th August 1976 and ended with the final going
to a second replay on 13 April 1977.

The final was contested by First Division teams Aston Villa and Everton at
Wembley Stadium in London, followed by replays at Hillsborough and finally being
decided at Old Trafford.
